artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Daikokuya Heikichi
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
markings: censor seals: 村田 {Murata}, 米良 {Mera};  シタ賣 {shitauri}; publisher\'s seal:  本　両國　大平板 {Hon, Ryōgoku, Daihei han}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: 一陽齋豊國画 {Ichiyōsai Toyokuni ga}
text: Related to the play Arigataya Oedo no Kagekiyo 難有御江戸景清, performed at the Kawarazaki Theater, 1850, 3rd month.
title: Actor Onoe Kikujirō II as Sagami, Kumagai's Wife
